Perforce Changelist Description Dialog Box

Requires: Professional System

Select Tools»Source Control»Show History, right-click a revision in the History list, and select Describe changelist to view changelist information if you are using the Perforce command line interface.

You also can select Tools»Source Control»Properties, select a numbered changelist from the Opened For indicator, and click the Describe button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to obtain a summary of information about a file in source control, including the path to the file in the Perforce depot and on the client, the type of file, check-out status, and modification dates.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Show differences—Displays a list of files revised in the specified changelist and paths to the files in the Perforce depot.

    Note  This option is not visible when you reach this dialog box from the Perforce File Information dialog box.
